data.title: Watch Anna Kendrick, Anna Camp, Brittany Snow, and More in the New Pitch Perfect 3 Music Video
data.meta_description: The cast of the a cappella trilogy joined contestants of The Voice for this mashup of “Freedom” and “Cups.”
data.text:
Tony and Oscar nominee Anna Kendrick (High Society) reunited with the Barden Bellas of Pitch Perfect and the Top 12 contestants of NBC’s The Voice for an original music video ahead of the release of the third installment in the a cappella movie franchise.

Pitch Perfect 3 hits cinemas nationwide December 22, directed by Trish Sie. The movie reunites original Barden Bellas, the underdog female a cappella group of fictional Barden University: Alexis Knapp, Hana Mae Lee, Ester Dean, Brittany Snow, and Anna Camp (currently starring on Broadway in Roundabout Theatre Company’s Time and the Conways). The video also features The Voice contestants Adam Cunningham, Janice Freeman, Ashland Craft, and Keisha Renee.

The music video features a mashup called “Freedom! ’90 x Cups,” featuring sections from both songs in an all-new arrangement. The song is available for download on iTunes.

Watch the full music video above.
